Package imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.project

Class EllipseProjector

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.project.EllipseProjector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfocalConicEllipseProjector, OrthogonalEllipseProjector, OrthogonalEllipseProjectorNewton
    public abstract class EllipseProjector
extends Object
    Abstract superclass of ellipse projectors, used to find the closest "contact" point on an ellipse for some given target point. Defines specific methods for calculating the distance only, without returning the point itself.
